title: Leaving AI Regulation to the States Could Strangle AI
description: Without federal preemption, a regulatory thicket of state AI laws threatens to slow the technology's development.
content: Artificial intelligence is advancing rapidly in the United States, but one thing threatens the industry's growth: state regulations. In July 2025, 38 states passed about 100 AI measures, according to… [+3761 chars]
